VEvil.​GameLogic.​Interactable.​APointerClickableEntity
MonoBehaviour
[RequireComponent(typeof(Collider))]
public abstract
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Interactable.​APointerClickableEntity
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Interactable.​Panel.​DirectionalPanelInteractable
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Interactable.​TNT.​TNTInteractable

APointerClickableEntity is an abstract class that give the possibility to an static/dynamic object to receive pointer events from the user.

A collider (its type doesn't matter) is required in order to have this component working, and this collider needs to be right next to a APointerClickableEntity component.

Variables
onPointerEnterEntityEditor
[Header("Pointer Clickable Entity - Events")]
[SerializeField, Tooltip("Invoked when the user's pointer is entering this entity.")]
private UnityEvent onPointerEnterEntityEditor
onPointerExitEntityEditor
[SerializeField, Tooltip("Invoked when the user's pointer is leaving this entity.")]
private UnityEvent onPointerExitEntityEditor
onPointerClickEntityEditor
[SerializeField, Tooltip("Invoked when the user's pointer is clicking this entity.")]
private UnityEvent onPointerClickEntityEditor
isInteractable
private bool isInteractable

Can this APointerClickableEntity receive and be clicked by the user's pointer ?

onPointerExitEntity

Invoked when the user's pointer is leaving this entity.

onPointerClickEntity

Invoked when the user's pointer is clicking this entity.
